actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide direct aid to the States and territories for educational purposes only for the benefit of the taxpayers and local governments.

summary.text: Directs that two percent of all Federal income taxes collected on individual incomes shall be deemed to be revenue for the State or territory from which it is collected to be used for educational purposes only, without any Federal direction or control.

titles.title: A bill to provide direct aid to the States and territories for educational purposes only for the benefit of the taxpayers and local governments.
